original: de ltar snang ba med pas gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar snang ba med pas gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: Since there is no appearance in that way, one should think, ‚ÄúI will liberate the world of sentient beings, which is devoid of the excellence of others.‚Äù

original: sngon du goms pa'i sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu las grol bar bya'o zhes pa la sogs par bsam pa'i sems de nyid lha mo'i gzugs su gyur nas go rims bzhin du bskul nas /
analyzed: sngon du goms pa'i sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu las grol bar bya'o zhes pa la sogs par bsam pa'i sems de nyid lha mo'i gzugs su gyur nas go rims bzhin du bskul nas /
translated: The mind that thinks in that way, ‚ÄúI will liberate the world of sentient beings, which is devoid of the excellence of others,‚Äù is transformed into the form of the goddess, and, in due order, she is urged.

original: de thim par bya'o zhes pa ni mi phyed par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de thim par bya'o zhes pa ni mi phyed par bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat dissolves into me‚Äù is taught to be nondual.

original: 'dir go rims kyis spyan mas bskul bar rigs pa la m'a ma k'i sa dang po bskul ba ni rgyud 'di las thugs gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir go rims kyis spyan mas bskul bar rigs pa la m'a ma k'i sa dang po bskul ba ni rgyud 'di las thugs gtso bor bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is reasonable that LocanƒÅ urges [the bodhisattva] in due order, and MƒÅmakƒ´ first urges [the bodhisattva] because in this tantra the mind is taught to be primary.

original: des bskul pa gang zhe na sems can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: des bskul pa gang zhe na sems can zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is the urging by her? It is ‚Äúthe realm of sentient beings,‚Äù and so on.

original: de yang sems can gyi khams ni khams gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang sems can gyi khams ni khams gsum ste /
translated: Moreover, the realm of sentient beings is the three realms.

original: der gnas pa ni sems can rnams so //
analyzed: der gnas pa ni sems can rnams so //
translated: Those who abide there are sentient beings.

original: de rnams kyi gtso bo ni dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gtso bo ni dbang phyug go //
translated: The principal one of those is ƒ™≈õvara.

original: de gang zhe na rdo rje thugs zhes te chos dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par dag @141b pa'i gzugs su gyur pa bod pa ste /
analyzed: de gang zhe na rdo rje thugs zhes te chos dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par dag @141b pa'i gzugs su gyur pa bod pa ste /
translated: What is that? It is the vajra mind, which is the pure form of the gnosis of the realm of phenomena.

original: bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Please protect me.

original: gang gis she na dga' ba yid 'ong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis she na dga' ba yid 'ong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: By what? By the delightful, pleasing,

original: dga' ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi'o //
translated: delight is that of method and wisdom.

original: de nyid yid tshim par byed pas na yid du 'ong zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid yid tshim par byed pas na yid du 'ong zhes so //
translated: Since that itself satisfies the mind, it is pleasing.

original: don chen ni don chen po yin pa 'am don ni rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don chen ni don chen po yin pa 'am don ni rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Great purpose is the great purpose or because the purpose is the cause.

original: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
translated: Desire is form and so on.

original: de rnams kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes te /
analyzed: de rnams kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhes te /
translated: Please protect me with those.

original: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
translated: Please delight.

original: mgon po zhes pos nas gal te bdag m'a ma k'i dus di ring gson par mchi bzhed na zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su ma mdzad na byams pa tshad med pa spangs pas bdag
analyzed: mgon po zhes pos nas gal te bdag m'a ma k'i dus di ring gson par mchi bzhed na zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzugs su ma mdzad na byams pa tshad med pa spangs pas bdag
translated: The protector is the Bhagavat himself. If he wishes to live today, means that if the Bhagavat does not manifest the body of gnosis, the form of the pure great elements, then, having abandoned immeasurable love,

original: shi ba dang 'dra bas bdag gson srid bar bzhed na /üîΩsems can la ba chen gnyen mchog ste //
analyzed: shi ba dang 'dra bas bdag gson srid bar bzhed na / sems can la ba chen gnyen mchog ste //
translated: he is like one dead. If he wishes to live,

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad du skyed par byed pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad du skyed par byed pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: the great friend of sentient beings means that the Bhagavat is the great friend of all sentient beings, because he is the one who generates all sentient beings as all Buddhas.

original: bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni ye shes kyi sku snang ba med pa rnam par spongs la zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i sku ston cig ces pa'o //üîΩde bzhin du spyan mas rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas bskul ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: bdag la dgyes par mdzod ces pa ni ye shes kyi sku snang ba med pa rnam par spongs la zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i sku ston cig ces pa'o // de bzhin du spyan mas rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas bskul ba gsungs pa /
translated: The line be pleased with me means, Abandon the non-manifestation of the body of gnosis and show the body of profound and perfect clarity.üîΩIn the same way, LocanƒÅ implores the Lord of the family,

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with the line, Then, the goddess LocanƒÅ, and so on.

original: rdo rje sku khyed ces pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na de skad do //
analyzed: rdo rje sku khyed ces pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na de skad do //
translated: The vajra body is you, because it is the very essence of the mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: bka'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni bka' nyid kyi 'khar los 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud la 'jug par mdzad pas na sems can kun la phan pa'i zhes tshim par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bka'i 'khor lo zhes pa ni bka' nyid kyi 'khar los 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyud la 'jug par mdzad pas na sems can kun la phan pa'i zhes tshim par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The wheel of speech is you, because it is the very essence of the pristine awareness of discernment, and it is the wheel of speech that engages the mind-streams of beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi don dang byang chub kyi don dam pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi don dang byang chub kyi don dam pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: The meaning of buddha and the meaning of enlightenment are the characteristics of ultimate pristine awareness.

original: sangs rgyas pa'i don du byang chub don dam phan par rjes su dgongs par gzigs pa'i dang tshul gang yin pa ni de skad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa'i don du byang chub don dam phan par rjes su dgongs par gzigs pa'i dang tshul gang yin pa ni de skad do //
translated: The way of seeing the ultimate benefit of enlightenment for the sake of buddhahood is just that.

original: mgon po la sogs pa ni kun la gong ma ltar bsgre'o //
analyzed: mgon po la sogs pa ni kun la gong ma ltar bsgre'o //
translated: The protector and so forth are all to be expanded as above.

original: 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Passion is the great bliss of supreme joy.

original: de nyid don chen po las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid don chen po las mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since it does not transgress the great meaning, it is a pledge.

original: de lta bu'i rol pas bdag spyan ma la zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rol pas bdag spyan ma la zhes so //
translated: By such play, I am Vak,

original: dgyes par mdzod ces pa yang kun la gong ma ltar bsgre'o //üîΩgos dkar mos bskul @142a * //
analyzed: dgyes par mdzod ces pa yang kun la gong ma ltar bsgre'o // gos dkar mos bskul @142a * //
translated: The phrase be pleased is to be applied to all [the goddesses] as above.üîΩWhite-Clad One's Exhortation

original: pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: pa gsungs pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn's reply to her exhortation is stated

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: beginning with Then.

original: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes pa ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas te so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na de skad do //
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes pa ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas te so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na de skad do //
translated: You are the vajra speech means that [he is] the lord of his own family, and is so called because he has become the essence of the discriminating wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pas phan zhing snying rje chen pos thugs brtse ba'i ngang tshul mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pas phan zhing snying rje chen pos thugs brtse ba'i ngang tshul mnga' ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: You are the one who benefits all sentient beings with love and has a nature of great compassion means that he is so called because he has a nature of great compassion.

original: 'jig rten dag gi don zhes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag gi don zhes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: The purpose of the worlds means unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The need is the characteristic of the perfection of mundane bliss.

original: de mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas na de skad do //
analyzed: de mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pas na de skad do //
translated: You are always diligent in accomplishing that means that he is so called because he is always endowed with great diligence in accomplishing that.

original: spyod pa dri med ces pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa dri med ces pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: The stainless conduct is the conduct of method and wisdom.

original: gang nyid gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas na dri med do //
analyzed: gang nyid gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas na dri med do //
translated: Since it is free from the grasped and the grasper, it is stainless.

original: gang ltar spyad kyang skyon med pas na kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: gang ltar spyad kyang skyon med pas na kun du bzang po'o //
translated: Since there is no fault in any conduct, it is all-good.

original: gzhan gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: The rest should be understood as above.

original: sgrol mas bskul ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgrol mas bskul ba gsungs pa /
translated: The Exhortation of Tara

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.üîΩYou are the vajra desire, etc.

original: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes pa ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas bskul ba ste /
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes pa ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas bskul ba ste /
translated: The exhortation is by way of one's own clan lord.

original: rdo rjer gyur cing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i rang bzhin de ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes bod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjer gyur cing gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i rang bzhin de ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes bod pa'o //
translated: The desire of the five sense objects, which is the nature of nondual gnosis, having become vajra, is called the vajra desire.

original: dam tshig mchog ces pa ni don yod par grub pa de thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na dam tshig mchog go //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ces pa ni don yod par grub pa de thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na dam tshig mchog go //
translated: The supreme commitment is Amoghasiddhi, who is supreme among all, thus the supreme commitment.

original: phan don zhes pa ni bdag kho na'i don bya'i gzhan la ni go skabs mi sbyin no zhes pa'i ngang tshul 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po mdzad pas na de skad do //
analyzed: phan don zhes pa ni bdag kho na'i don bya'i gzhan la ni go skabs mi sbyin no zhes pa'i ngang tshul 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa rgya chen po mdzad pas na de skad do //
translated: The benefit is the great benefit for all beings, since he has the attitude I will accomplish the benefit of only myself and will not give an opportunity to others.

original: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung //
translated: The family is the lineage of the perfect Buddha.

original: zhes pa ni rigs te de nyid thig ler gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs te de nyid thig ler gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: Since it is the essence of that, it is the supreme.

original: mnyam pa nyid ni zab mo dang gsal ba dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid ni zab mo dang gsal ba dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Equality is the inseparability of the profound and the clear.

original: de skad cig gis rtogs pa de la gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de skad cig gis rtogs pa de la gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The realization of that in an instant is called the vision.

original: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur zhes pa ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan rin po che mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur zhes pa ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan rin po che mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the source of many jewels of good qualities, because it is the source of many jewels of good qualities such as the ten powers.

original: gzhan gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gong ma ltar shes par bya'o //
translated: The other qualities should be understood as above.

original: da ni zhu ba gnyis pa'i lan la gtogs pa tshig bzhi pas padma'i nang du sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i sems can rnams snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur bar @142b gsungs pa /üîΩde nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩde nas zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams snying la zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: da ni zhu ba gnyis pa'i lan la gtogs pa tshig bzhi pas padma'i nang du sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i sems can rnams snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur bar @142b gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o // de nas zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams snying la zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Now, in the answer to the second request, the four lines beginning with ‚Äúlotus‚Äù state the consecration in order to make sentient beings fit vessels for the emanation ma·πá·∏çala in the lotus.

original: 'dod chags thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'dod chags thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: Then, all the tathƒÅgatas,üîΩhaving entered the hearts of the sugatas,

original: de nyid byang chub kyi sems su nye bar longs spyod pa ste de nyid dpal lo //
analyzed: de nyid byang chub kyi sems su nye bar longs spyod pa ste de nyid dpal lo //
translated: enjoy the bodhicitta, which is glorious,

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam pas snyoms par zhugs nas zhes so //
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam pas snyoms par zhugs nas zhes so //
translated: and enter into equipoise in the vajra-holding samƒÅdhi.

original: btsun mo de dag la zhes pa ni lha mo dgu'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: btsun mo de dag la zhes pa ni lha mo dgu'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: To those queens,üîΩthe ma·πá·∏çala of the pledge,

original: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
translated: the vajra-holding one

original: dngos po thams cad las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: consecrates the bodhicitta.üîΩThen, all the tathƒÅgatas, having entered the hearts of the sugatas, enjoy the bodhicitta, which is glorious, and enter into equipoise in the vajra-holding samƒÅdhi.üîΩTo those queens, the ma·πá·∏çala of the pledge, the vajra-holding one consecrates the bodhicitta.

original: nam mkha' dbyings 'di thams cad ces pa ni lha mo'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs mal sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su gyur pa'i tshul gyis dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ba ste dper na bum pa rdo
analyzed: nam mkha' dbyings 'di thams cad ces pa ni lha mo'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du chud pa'i khang pa brtsegs mal sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su gyur pa'i tshul gyis dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ba ste dper na bum pa rdo
translated: The entire sky is the celestial mansion, etc. , included in the goddess's dharmodaya, which is completely filled with the essence of commitment, by way of the transformation of all the Tathagatas, like a vase filled with the water of the vajra.üîΩThe mouths are the mouths of those [Tathagatas], and the path is the path of the mouths, and the heart lotuses are the heart lotuses of the disciples, and the entrance is the entrance into the heart lotuses.

original: rje'i chus gang ba lta bur gnas par gyur pas de rnams kyi kha'i lam nas snying gi padmar zhugs pas dbang bskur bar byas pa'o //üîΩde'i de ma thag tu tshig lnga gsungs pa /
analyzed: rje'i chus gang ba lta bur gnas par gyur pas de rnams kyi kha'i lam nas snying gi padmar zhugs pas dbang bskur bar byas pa'o // de'i de ma thag tu tshig lnga gsungs pa /
translated: The empowerment is the empowerment conferred by the entrance of the essence of commitment into the heart lotuses.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Immediately after that, the five verses beginning with then are spoken.

original: de nas zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag pa'o //
translated: The then is immediately after the empowerment.

original: gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam tshig las byung ba zhes pa ni snod du rung bar bya ba'i 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam tshig las byung ba zhes pa ni snod du rung bar bya ba'i 'gro ba ste /
translated: The sentient beings are the beings who are to be made into suitable recipients, who arise from the commitment of the three bodies.

original: de'i sa bon dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sa bon dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they possess the seed of that [empowerment].

original: de nyid la gong gi dpal gyis reg pas de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes su gyur to zhes te /
analyzed: de nyid la gong gi dpal gyis reg pas de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes su gyur to zhes te /
translated: Since that is touched by the above glory, all of them also become the exalted wisdom of the three vajras of the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Accomplished Buddha.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor zla ba ltar zhu ba de'i ngo bo gsung gi rdo rje'i sa bon dang thugs kyi mtshan ma la des mtshan pa /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor zla ba ltar zhu ba de'i ngo bo gsung gi rdo rje'i sa bon dang thugs kyi mtshan ma la des mtshan pa /
translated: The essence of the perfect Buddha melts like the moon into the seed of the vajra of speech and the sign of the mind, which are marked by that.

original: sku'i ngo bor khams kun 'dus par byas nas de la ming gi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: sku'i ngo bor khams kun 'dus par byas nas de la ming gi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Having caused all the elements to gather into the essence of the body, the name empowerment is conferred upon that.

original: de gang zhe na de'i dus na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de gang zhe na de'i dus na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: What is that? At that time, etc.

original: kun du bzang po zhes pa ni sgo gsum nas skyon med pa ste /
analyzed: kun du bzang po zhes pa ni sgo gsum nas skyon med pa ste /
translated: Samantrabhadra means faultless in terms of the three doors.

original: kun la khyab pas na zlos pa'i tshig smos pa'o //
analyzed: kun la khyab pas na zlos pa'i tshig smos pa'o //
translated: Since it pervades all, the word again is stated.

original: de lta bus dbang bskur bar gyur to zhes so //
analyzed: de lta bus dbang bskur bar gyur to zhes so //
translated: In that way, the empowerment was conferred.

original: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de rnams la dris shing rtogs pa phul ba gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de rnams la dris shing rtogs pa phul ba gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, Vajradhara the Great spoke to them about the questions and the offerings of realization. Then, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ces pa ni de dang de'i @143a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ces pa ni de dang de'i @143a * //
translated: All those tathagatas refers to the buddhas of the three times.üîΩ

original: rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa ste cho ga bzhis bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa ste cho ga bzhis bskyed pa'o //
translated: All those Tathagatas means those of that and that lineage, the Tathagatas and so forth, generated by the four rites.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid ces pa ni sems can thams cad zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i 'khor lor mthong ngam zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid ces pa ni sems can thams cad zab mo dang yang dag par gsal ba'i 'khor lor mthong ngam zhes pa'o //
translated: The sameness of phenomena means that all sentient beings are seen in the wheel of profound and perfect clarity.

original: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa ni dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa ni dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: The conduct of vajra wisdom is the consecration,

original: 'bras bu dang bcas par mthong ba'o zhes rtogs pa phul ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang bcas par mthong ba'o zhes rtogs pa phul ba'o //
translated: seeing with its result.

original: de'i de ma thag tu tshig drug pas 'di la rtogs pa'i gsum pa gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i de ma thag tu tshig drug pas 'di la rtogs pa'i gsum pa gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Immediately after that, the third realization is stated in this [tantra] with six words, beginning with then.

original: de nas zhes ba ni rtogs pa phul ba'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes ba ni rtogs pa phul ba'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then means immediately after the offering of the realization.

original: btsun mo las 'das nas zhes pa ni gsang ba'i bha ga las chos kyi 'byung gnas su 'thon pa'o //
analyzed: btsun mo las 'das nas zhes pa ni gsang ba'i bha ga las chos kyi 'byung gnas su 'thon pa'o //
translated: Having passed beyond the queen means emerging from the secret bhaga into the dharmodaya.

original: de nas gong ma ltar ngo mtshar zhing 'dod chags che na po'i che ba bsngags pa'i phyir de dag gis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes so //
analyzed: de nas gong ma ltar ngo mtshar zhing 'dod chags che na po'i che ba bsngags pa'i phyir de dag gis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes so //
translated: Then, in order to praise the greatness of the most intense passion, as above, they said to the Blessed One, Vajrapani Tathagata, as follows.

original: ji ltar gsol zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gsol zhe na /
translated: How did they speak?

original: gang 'dod chags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'dod chags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: With the words, Passion is the supreme joy, great bliss, and so on.

original: 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba chen po ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba chen po ste /
translated: Passion is the supreme joy, great bliss.

original: de'i yi ge'i tshig ni mi 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags kyi ye shes dang bar ma'i ye shes dang chags bral gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i yi ge'i tshig ni mi 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags kyi ye shes dang bar ma'i ye shes dang chags bral gyi ye shes so //
translated: Its syllabic phrase is the unchanging passion intuition, the middle intuition, and the passionless intuition.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su chud pa ni go rims bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / chos kyi sku dang sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo yongs su dag ba de ngo mtshar to zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su chud pa ni go rims bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / chos kyi sku dang sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo yongs su dag ba de ngo mtshar to zhes pa'o //
translated: The penetration of the Buddha enlightenment is the essence of the perfect purity of the Enjoyment Body, the Dharma Body, and the Emanation Body, respectively. That is wonderful.

original: brtags pa dang bral bas don de kho nar nges pas ngo mtshar mi che ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
analyzed: brtags pa dang bral bas don de kho nar nges pas ngo mtshar mi che ba'i rgyu gsungs pa /
translated: The reason for the non-wonderfulness is stated, because of the freedom from conceptual differentiation, the ascertainment of the meaning as it is.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, then, etc.üîΩDo not say that, etc.

original: de skad ma gsung cig ces pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa la 'khrul par rtogs nas bsam pa de dag dgag pa'o //
analyzed: de skad ma gsung cig ces pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa la 'khrul par rtogs nas bsam pa de dag dgag pa'o //
translated: Having understood the error of desire, etc., he prohibits those thoughts.

original: de ci'i slang du zhes zhus pa dang lan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci'i slang du zhes zhus pa dang lan gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All phenomena, etc.

original: chos thams cad ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni snang ba'o //
translated: All phenomena are appearances.

original: nam mkha' nyid rdo rje ste mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go /
analyzed: nam mkha' nyid rdo rje ste mi 'da' bas na dam tshig go /
translated: Space itself is the vajra, since it is not transgressed, it is the commitment.

original: de nyid de bzhin te /
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin te /
translated: That itself is suchness.

original: de'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir na mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir na mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Since it has the nature of that, it is the same.

original: de bas gzugs kyi phung po ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas gzugs kyi phung po ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not the form aggregate,

original: sa la sogs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: not earth, etc.

original: tshor ba'i phung po ma yin zhing bde ba la sogs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po ma yin zhing bde ba la sogs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the feeling aggregate, not pleasure, etc.

original: 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dbye ba'o //
translated: Discernment is the division of apprehending signs.

original: 'du byed ni @143b reg pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni @143b reg pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Formations are contact, etc.

original: rnam par shes pa ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is not the eye consciousness, etc.

original: khams ni mig la sogs pa'i khams bco brgyad ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: khams ni mig la sogs pa'i khams bco brgyad ma yin pa'o //
translated: The elements are not the eighteen elements such as the eye.

original: skye mched ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mched bcu gnyis ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mched bcu gnyis ma yin pa'o //
translated: The sense bases are not the twelve sense bases such as the eye.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po la dbye ba 'dod chags ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po la dbye ba 'dod chags ma yin /
translated: The aggregate of compositional factors is not desire,

original: zhe sdang ma yin /
analyzed: zhe sdang ma yin /
translated: it is not hatred,

original: gti mug ma yin zhes so //
analyzed: gti mug ma yin zhes so //
translated: it is not delusion.

original: chos ma yin zhes pa ni dge ba bcu ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin zhes pa ni dge ba bcu ma yin pa'o //
translated: The non-dharmas are not the ten virtues.

original: chos ma yin pa ni mi dge ba bcu ste de yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa ni mi dge ba bcu ste de yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: The non-dharmas are the ten non-virtues, and they are also not that.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la 'khrul pa nyid de rnams su snang ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la 'khrul pa nyid de rnams su snang ste /
translated: Why is that? The non-dual wisdom itself appears as those errors.

original: de bas rtogs par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid las tha dad par gyur pa de rnams rnam par dgag pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas rtogs par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid las tha dad par gyur pa de rnams rnam par dgag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, those that are different from the nature of what is to be realized are negated.

original: chos thams cad la dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
translated: The indivisible nature of the wisdom that does not observe any phenomena at all.

original: cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
analyzed: cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
translated: He became silent.

original: zhes pa ni the tshom chod nas rang ba zhin la blo gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni the tshom chod nas rang ba zhin la blo gzhag pa'o //
translated: This means that having cut through doubts, he settled his mind in its natural state.

original: de'i de ma thag tu spros pa'i bdag nyid gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gong ma ltar bstan pa'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i de ma thag tu spros pa'i bdag nyid gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gong ma ltar bstan pa'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Immediately after that, the other's purpose is taught as the perfection of elaboration, as above.

original: de ltar zhus pa dang lan ched du brjod pa dang bcas pas rgyud kyi don bstan nas da ni 'khor rnams la yongs su gtad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar zhus pa dang lan ched du brjod pa dang bcas pas rgyud kyi don bstan nas da ni 'khor rnams la yongs su gtad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having taught the meaning of the tantra with the question and the response with the exclamation, now, the teaching of the entrustment to the retinue is stated.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, and so on.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di zhes pa ni de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di zhes pa ni de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
translated: This body, speech, and mind vajra is the text that teaches the Guhyasamaja.

original: bsgo bar gsol zhes pa ni phyogs bcur bsgrag tu gsol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bsgo bar gsol zhes pa ni phyogs bcur bsgrag tu gsol zhes pa'o //
translated: The request to command is please proclaim in the ten directions.

original: de ci'i slad du zhes zhus pa dang lan gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhes zhus pa dang lan gsungs pa /
translated: The question why is that? is answered.

original: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: The statement those abiding in the ten directions and so on is easy to understand.

original: de ltar thun mong du gtad nas khyad par du rdo rje chos la gtad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar thun mong du gtad nas khyad par du rdo rje chos la gtad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Having thus entrusted the tantra in general, the special entrustment to Vajradharma is stated.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, and so on.

original: rigs kyi bu zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu zhes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase son of good family is because [the Bodhisattva] is born from the nature of the discriminating wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i lung ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i lung ngo //
translated: The pledge of all Tathagatas is the transmission that should not be transgressed.

original: de zung shig ste bstan pa 'di ni gsung gi rdo rje gtso bo bas na khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lce'i dbang po rnam par dag pas na chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya bar dbang bskur re zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de zung shig ste bstan pa 'di ni gsung gi rdo rje gtso bo bas na khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lce'i dbang po rnam par dag pas na chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya bar dbang bskur re zhes pa'o //
translated: You should hold that, and this teaching is the chief of the Vajra Speech, therefore you are consecrated with the name Vajra Lord of Dharma, because of the purity of the organ of speech of all Tathagatas.

original: @144a * // des kyang de bzhin du sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: @144a * // des kyang de bzhin du sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: He also says, I will practice in that way.

original: de nas rdo rje chos kyis byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes so //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje chos kyis byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes so //
translated: Then Vajradharma said, I will do just so, and became silent.

original: da ni bsnyen pa rnams kyi mthar dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni bsnyen pa rnams kyi mthar dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the ritual for the dissolution of the mandala at the end of the approach is stated:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase then and so forth.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge zhes pa ni de rnams kyi thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum la zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge zhes pa ni de rnams kyi thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum la zhes so //
translated: The ‚Äúvajrasattva syllables‚Äù are the three syllables located on the sign at the heart of those [deities].

original: sems can rnams btsud par gyur to zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor pa de rnams brjod pas rigs kyi bye brag gis nang du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams btsud par gyur to zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor pa de rnams brjod pas rigs kyi bye brag gis nang du gzhug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe sentient beings entered‚Äù means that by the recitation of those ma·πá·∏çala deities, they enter inside by the different types of families.

original: de'i don ni dgod pa bstan par bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas dus gsum du mchod pa la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i yi ge gsum brjod pas rnam par bsdus nas smon lam gdab pa la sogs pa gzhan yang ci rigs par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni dgod pa bstan par bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas dus gsum du mchod pa la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i yi ge gsum brjod pas rnam par bsdus nas smon lam gdab pa la sogs pa gzhan yang ci rigs par bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows: The yogƒ´ who is to be placed should gather the ma·πá·∏çala deities by reciting the three syllables at the beginning of the three times, such as the offerings, and so on, and make the aspiration prayers, and so on, as appropriate.

original: tha mar yang de'i mtha' la mu: bzhag pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol ba dang / de brjod pas phyi rol gyi 'khor lo ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo la gzhug pa ste khyad par ro //
analyzed: tha mar yang de'i mtha' la mu: bzhag pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol ba dang / de brjod pas phyi rol gyi 'khor lo ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo la gzhug pa ste khyad par ro //
translated: At the end, by placing MU·∏§ at the end of that, the gnosis wheel is requested to depart, and by reciting that, the outer wheel is caused to enter the gnosis wheel of the retinue. That is the difference.

original: de nas shes rab dang bcas pa nyal nas langs pa'i dus na yang lha mo'i dbyangs kyis bskul nas langs par bsam zhing gong ma bzhin du dus bzhir bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de nas shes rab dang bcas pa nyal nas langs pa'i dus na yang lha mo'i dbyangs kyis bskul nas langs par bsam zhing gong ma bzhin du dus bzhir bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
translated: Then, when the yogi falls asleep with wisdom, he should imagine that he is awakened by the sound of the goddesses, and he should meditate in the four periods as before.

original: de ni rtse gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rtse gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: This is the yoga of one-pointedness.

original: bya bas brel pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni tho rangs kyi dus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs par bsgoms te dus gzhan la de la brten pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnas la yi ge gsum gyis dam tshig gi 'khor lo snying ga'i 'khor lo las spros nas dbang bskur
analyzed: bya bas brel pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni tho rangs kyi dus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs par bsgoms te dus gzhan la de la brten pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnas la yi ge gsum gyis dam tshig gi 'khor lo snying ga'i 'khor lo las spros nas dbang bskur
translated: The yoga of one who is busy with activities should meditate on the three samadhis at dawn, and at other times he should abide with pride based on that, and emanate the pledge wheel from the heart wheel with the three syllables, and take empowerment.

original: ba blangs te mchod pa la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas mi shigs pa'i thig le 'am gsang ba'i thig le gang rung gcig bsgoms te bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor bsdus nas /
analyzed: ba blangs te mchod pa la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas mi shigs pa'i thig le 'am gsang ba'i thig le gang rung gcig bsgoms te bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor bsdus nas /
translated: Having pleased the deities with offerings and so forth, he should meditate on either the indestructible drop or the secret drop, perform the recitation, and dissolve the mandala.

original: yan lag gzhan gong ma ltar spyad cing tha ma yang gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag gzhan gong ma ltar spyad cing tha ma yang gong ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: He should perform the other limbs as before, and he should understand the end as before.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis brtan par gyur pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa lnga mthong ba de la ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //üîΩdes mtshan ma lan grangs mang du mthong bas sems brtan par shes nas gnyis @144b par gyur pa'i sbyor bas 'bad pas lha'i lus thob par snod rnam pa gnyis la ye shes kyi lha gnyis 'bebs pa'i nus pa thob pa la cung zad ye shes dbang du gyur
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis brtan par gyur pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa lnga mthong ba de la ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o // des mtshan ma lan grangs mang du mthong bas sems brtan par shes nas gnyis @144b par gyur pa'i sbyor bas 'bad pas lha'i lus thob par snod rnam pa gnyis la ye shes kyi lha gnyis 'bebs pa'i nus pa thob pa la cung zad ye shes dbang du gyur
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ who sees the five signs in this way, through both of these [types of] stability, is called a beginner.

original: pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Having seen the signs many times, and knowing the mind to be stable, [he/she] is called a yogi/nƒ´ who has attained a little mastery over gnosis, who has attained the ability to cause the two gnoses of the deity to descend into the two vessels, having striven with the application of the two [types of] stability, and who has attained the body of the deity.

original: des thun mtshams bzhir chen po'i mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
analyzed: des thun mtshams bzhir chen po'i mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
translated: Having blessed the great eyes, etc., in the four sessions, and having blessed the body, speech, and mind, and having taken the empowerment,

original: mchod pa la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas thig le dang phra mo ma gtogs pa'i cig car ba'i bzlas pa byas nas gong ma ltar 'khor lo bsdus nas yan lag gzhan yang ji ltar rigs par byas pas mthu can gyi stobs rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas thig le dang phra mo ma gtogs pa'i cig car ba'i bzlas pa byas nas gong ma ltar 'khor lo bsdus nas yan lag gzhan yang ji ltar rigs par byas pas mthu can gyi stobs rtogs pa'o //
translated: Having pleased them with offerings and so forth, one should perform the simultaneous repetition except for the drop and subtle [repetition], and having withdrawn the wheels as before, one should also perform the other branches as appropriate.

original: des gsung la dmigs pa'i rkyen gyis rlung gi rang bzhin shes nas /
analyzed: des gsung la dmigs pa'i rkyen gyis rlung gi rang bzhin shes nas /
translated: By that, having understood the nature of the wind through the condition of focusing on speech,

original: rang dang gzhan gyis dkyil 'khor mthong bar nus pa de la ni ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyis dkyil 'khor mthong bar nus pa de la ni ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
translated: one is able to see the mandala of oneself and others. That is called the yogi who has mastered pristine consciousness.

original: des rdo rje bzlas pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin kun du spyod pa can gyi sems las phyi nang dbyer med par rtogs pas /
analyzed: des rdo rje bzlas pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin kun du spyod pa can gyi sems las phyi nang dbyer med par rtogs pas /
translated: By that, one who practices the samƒÅdhi of the three vajra letters has realized the inseparability of outer and inner from the mind.

original: phal cher nyin mtshan du rnal 'byor la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: phal cher nyin mtshan du rnal 'byor la gnas pa yin no //
translated: For the most part, one abides in yoga day and night.

original: de mi 'gyur ba'i rtags dang po gnyis dang gnyis pa rtogs pas zhing sbyangs nas lam la gnas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de mi 'gyur ba'i rtags dang po gnyis dang gnyis pa rtogs pas zhing sbyangs nas lam la gnas par bya ba'o //
translated: That is the first and second sign of immutability. Having purified the field through realizing the second, one should abide in the path.

original: lam gang zhe na ;
analyzed: lam gang zhe na ;
translated: What is the path?

original: dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the two organs,

original: dngos po thams cad brtag par bya //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad brtag par bya // zhes pa ste /
translated: all things are to be examined.

original: sems rigs can gyi char dmigs pa las sngon dang phyis kyi yan lag mngon du mdzad pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems rigs can gyi char dmigs pa las sngon dang phyis kyi yan lag mngon du mdzad pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes dbang du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ who is in control of the gnosis of reality, which is the actualization of the prior and subsequent branches, is called a yogi/nƒ´ of the mind-stream type.

original: de lnga pa'i ngo bos sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sprul pa dpag med kyis ji srid yod pa de srid kyi bar du bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don chen po mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de lnga pa'i ngo bos sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sprul pa dpag med kyis ji srid yod pa de srid kyi bar du bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don chen po mdzad pa'o //
translated: By means of the five, the form of the five, the emanations of body, speech, and mind are immeasurable. Abiding for as long as the world exists, they perform great benefit for the world.

original: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa de mthong ba'i chos nyid la rgyud kyi don des 'grub par byed pas na de la dad par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa de mthong ba'i chos nyid la rgyud kyi don des 'grub par byed pas na de la dad par bya'o //
translated: Since the meaning of the tantra is accomplished in the very life of such a yogi/nƒ´, one should have faith in it.

original: ha cang spros pa bzhag la dkyus ma la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: ha cang spros pa bzhag la dkyus ma la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: Having set aside the elaborate, one should enter the medium.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas gong gi rdo rje gsum bsdus pa'i gnas de yang nam mkha' lta bu bas sems can rnams la yang khyab par bstan to //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas gong gi rdo rje gsum bsdus pa'i gnas de yang nam mkha' lta bu bas sems can rnams la yang khyab par bstan to //
translated: The place of the gathering of the three vajras, as above, is taught to pervade all sentient beings, like space.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa ni sku la dmigs pa'i dus su rdo rje 'chang chen po la de skad ces @145a * //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa ni sku la dmigs pa'i dus su rdo rje 'chang chen po la de skad ces @145a * //
translated: Vairochana is the name of Great Vajradhara at the time of the observation of the body.

original: bya'o ; / khams gsum thams cad ces pa ni khams gsum gyi brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i chos ji snyed dus gsum du rtogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: bya'o ; / khams gsum thams cad ces pa ni khams gsum gyi brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i chos ji snyed dus gsum du rtogs pa rnams so //
translated: All the three realms are all the phenomena of the three realms, moving and unmoving, as many as there are, in the three times.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la gnas shing zhes pa ni /üîΩde rnams kyi sku'i rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid la rang gi sku rdo rje nyid ngo bo nyid don dam pa'am /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la gnas shing zhes pa ni / de rnams kyi sku'i rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid la rang gi sku rdo rje nyid ngo bo nyid don dam pa'am /
translated: Abiding in the vajra body, speech, and mind,

original: kun rdzob tu dbyer med par snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu dbyer med par snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: means that the nature of those is the nature of one's own vajra body, which is either the ultimate or the relative, indivisibly united.

original: de nyid kyis na sku dang mi bral ba nyid kyi phyir na sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sku dang mi bral ba nyid kyi phyir na sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of being inseparable from the body, the body, speech, and mind are also taught.

original: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni sku'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni sku'i rdo rje'o //
translated: Therefore, the body of all the Tathagatas is the Body Vajra.

original: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de la dmigs pa'o //
translated: Its sameness is the Reality which is the objective support.

original: cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes pa ni /
analyzed: cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes pa ni /
translated: He became silent.

original: de bzhin nyid la ni gang gis brjod pas kyang mi reg pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la ni gang gis brjod pas kyang mi reg pa'i phyir na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is said because nothing can touch Reality.

original: de kho na bzhin 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied in the same way to the following, the Speech Vajra and the Mind Vajra.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa ;
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa ;
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: de skad du //
analyzed: de skad du //
translated: In this way,

original: sems kun du bzang po yi //
analyzed: sems kun du bzang po yi //
translated: the mind is universal goodness,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa yi //üîΩrdo rje gsum la kun du ni //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa yi // rdo rje gsum la kun du ni //
translated: the body, speech, and mind are ascertainedüîΩin the three vajras,

original: rdo rje gsum ni rnam bzhugs te //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni rnam bzhugs te //
translated: the three vajras are present.

original: zhes so // de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes so // de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes pa ni /
translated: This is said.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud mthar thug pa'i sdud pa po'i tshig go //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud mthar thug pa'i sdud pa po'i tshig go //
translated: This is the statement of the compiler, who is the ultimate root tantra.

original: dam tshig ces pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i srung ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ces pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i srung ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vows are the mundane and supramundane observances, etc.

original: sngom pa ni nyams su blang ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngom pa ni nyams su blang ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The observances are the practices, etc.

original: de rdo rje lta bus byin gyis rlob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rdo rje lta bus byin gyis rlob par byed pa'o //
translated: He is the vajra because he blesses them.

original: mdzad par byed pas na rgyal po ste /üîΩde ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u bcu bdun pa'o //
analyzed: mdzad par byed pas na rgyal po ste / de ston par byed pa'i gzhung ni le'u bcu bdun pa'o //
translated: He is the king because he acts.üîΩThe chapter that teaches this is the seventeenth.

original: le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o //üîΩrgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa chen po rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rtsi lu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o // rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa chen po rin po che'i ljon shing zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rtsi lu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This is the commentary on the seventeenth chapter of the tantra.üîΩThe great commentary on the glorious Guhyasamaja Root Tantra, the great king of tantras, called the Jewel Tree, composed by the great master Cirajva, is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka mal gupta dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka mal gupta dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: It was translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian abbot Kamalagupta and the great Tibetan editor and translator, the lord Yeshe Gyeltsen.
